body: The attached workflow generate 10 random zones in a fix 3D grid. Sometimes, the zones generated sometimes can be processed by the **intersectMass** correctly: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/DfCm7EeUxj5L185WHIuGdlvXE-z7TVOre6sVbPRWEQv1iRtjbnKb3QZxSI8ANG*LC7UjYCk5X4SIFnmWt4Aw4p0aZa4gHH96/Image4.png) However, After changing the seed of the random function, some of the breps generated cannot be processed by **intersectMass** and a warning is shown: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/DfCm7EeUxj6amyfZToATkDdSeaAHOLULnFWgQ1SG-tfYrgdyk1X5PD1Dv85w0itQxrKf*sxJItN8mxIHvdu9qRcxS-7pm0-o/Image5.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/DfCm7EeUxj6HL7Em2*ACwaAIceaeHKLQpkcksIUbo5geqxhEpZpHiFqAVNbnW8pxQiCn7WLpKIyxzUlkvhPotG1qJ26N*bSp/Image2.png) Another strange thing is that the warning on **intersectMass** is not consistent, i.e. the same group of breps sometimes can be processed, and sometimes not ... And I'm sure it's not the problem of the breps. Appreciate your kind advice on this issue which is quite blizzard ... Thanks.
topic: intersectMass component is unable to process normal breps and the warning is inconsistent
